messages.title: VOTE FOR A FUTURE TO BELIEVE IN
messages.content: Your city is unique and special. That’s why you deserve an MP who is, first and foremost, a passionate representative for you and your interests. The Green Party is a party that believes in local decision making and that every individual deserves an MP who really listens, and acts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will give you a say over what comes next for Brexit. Greens will fight for your right to a final say on the Brexit deal, with the option to remain closely linked to our friends in Europe.
Greens champion the NHS. We would roll back privatisation, ensure it is properly funded, free at the point of service, and that mental health gets the money it needs.

Invest in a Green New Deal. We are the only party consistently fighting for bold action to rein in climate chaos. We need to invest in renewable energy, insulate homes and transform our transport system.

issues.brexitEurope: We will give you a say over what comes next for Brexit. Greens will fight for your right to a final say on the Brexit deal, with the option to remain closely linked to our friends in Europe.
issues.environment: Invest in a Green New Deal. We are the only party consistently fighting for bold action to rein in climate chaos. We need to invest in renewable energy, insulate homes and transform our transport system.
issues.health: Greens champion the NHS. We would roll back privatisation, ensure it is properly funded, free at the point of service, and that mental health gets the money it needs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Caroline Lucas, Green MP for Brighton Pavilion (2010-2017) has been a strong independent voice in parliament. Another Green MP could double the impact this is having for people and planet.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has been a strong independent voice in parliament. Another Green MP could double the impact this is having for people and planet.

images.caption: Various images of Caroline Lucas and supporting quotes.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes that the Green Party champions local decision making and that Caroline Lucas has been a responsive and effective MP. The Green Party aims to involve constituents in the decision-making process for Brexit and takes a strong stance on environmental issues and health services.
